channel.title: Easter Speical mission
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Easter Speical mission"

item.title: Easter Speical mission
item.content:encoded:
Strawberry has a bunny problem
Strawberry needs help with Bunnys
I forgot the exact name of the mission but it went like this

Strawberry's all mopey (which, for Reapers, means lots of metal and stabbing).

"I got this STUPID BUNNY for a holiday present for Shorty, and it is totally BOOTLEG!"

It really is, too - one of the ears is a little short, the stitching is off, and oh yeah - it is FILLED WITH NON-DELICIOUS POISON.

"You! Go hunt down some Bunny Eggs in the forest (ingredient hunt!), put them together into a real Shortbunny, and GET ME MY PRESENT!" Eep.

He tosses you the Bootleg Bunny!

Continue mission

Shortbunny, Transform!
Strawberry's still a little miffed, and gies you the stinkeye. "Well?" (you'll probably have to temporarily abandon this mission while you go get the Eggs. Don't worry, it'll be waiting for you when you are done)

I have six Bunny Eggs
(If the mission has a requirement, be sure to have completed it before you click above, or you'll fail the mission!)

AS far as I got so fat…. OF COURSE I did my ingredant hunt RIGHT before this mission so…. thats all I got

EDIT: mission name is Bootleg Bunny and description is Strawberry has a bunny problem!
